name: "All or Nothing"
description: A game die metamorphosed from the "Aventurine of Stratagems," which shall decide the gamblers' destiny in the Gamble.

skills.name: Fickle Fortune
skills.description: Immune to DMG. When this unit is attacked by a target that has entered the Gamble, apply 1 random number (between 1 and 6) to the target.
